queries.description: Passing arguments to <ctype.h> functions outside the range of unsigned char or EOF causes undefined behavior.
queries.name: <ctype.h> function arguments shall be represented as unsigned char

RULE-21-13.title: Any value passed to a function in <ctype.h> shall be representable as an unsigned char or be the value EOF

queries.description: Passing pointers to incompatible types as arguments to memcpy, memmove and memcmp indicates programmers' confusion.
queries.name: The pointer arguments to the Standard Library functions memcpy, memmove and memcmp shall be pointers

RULE-21-15.title: The pointer arguments to the Standard Library functions memcpy, memmove and memcmp shall be pointers to qualified or unqualified versions of compatible types
